Drawing gold, I express my condemnation to the most cruel persecution of man, not because Israel is a Jew, but because it is a state of terror.
We can never accept a concept of Jewish persecution. Judaism is not a form of belief that justifies innocent people killing.
We can never accept a concept of Islamic terrorism. Islam is the religion of peace on its name; terror, blood can never come together side by side.

This Wednesday night, I will travel to Washington to hold a series of meetings with different sectors of the United States.
The work agenda will include meetings with President Obama and Vice President Biden as well as meetings with senators and congressmen.
On Thursday and Friday the 3 Central American leaders will meet with representatives of Senate Committees on immigration issues.
We will also meet with Secretary of Homeland Security Jeh Johnson, the OAS Secretary General, and the President of the IDB
The meeting with Vice President Joseph Biden, will be Friday during a lunch and then the meeting with Obama in the White House.
